thread.title: Sean

author: Sean
title: Sean
text:
The website/catalog is easy to navigate and customer service is very helpful. After selecting of the type of product that best suited the need, I was hesitant about the very economical price listed. To be sure there were no extra charge for personalizing, I contacted customer service. The wait time was very minimal, the rep was very knowledgeable and the price shown was indeed the complete cost (less delivery). Online ordering was required, but the personalizing was made very easy using the prompts. Product arrived in a timely manner and looks excellent.
My only suggestion - An eCheck payment option would have been convenient especially for small businesses.
